description:
This is an open ended collection type RPG game

Our heroine ruby is an orphan,
Every morning, she goes out to explore the secret island of God
Every night, she put on her nightdress

Go to all places, steal treasures or precious paintings
Let yourself have a warm home

The story begins in Sincere City
In this small town, there are many precious treasures and stories left by her parents

Game manipulation

Left or right mouse button
Keyboard space ESC and direction key
Some game controllers are supported


Game features

There are many cute pets waiting for you to collect in the game

Every day, if you want to go to sea,
The islands you go to are all random, which is worth your repeated exploration and adventure

16 hidden CGS

Characters and events in the game are accompanied by day and night system
Every day will change!

for example
Mysterious merchant, hidden treasure

Go to the auction house for auction

Museum donation
Learn some useful or useless magic
You need to switch your clothes between day and night, and make a lot of money in the game

Decorate your home with your own efforts


In games
You need to avoid the police, thieves and monsters

Protect yourself from being hurt by them!
There are a variety of magic props and rich hidden elements in the game, waiting for everyone's discovery!
